DOC.brief_summary: The goal project determine effect 6-week dietary supplementation one two dos citicoline ( 250 mg/d , 500 mg/d ) placebo prefrontal cortical membrane dynamic ( 31P-MRS ) event-related functional activation ( fMRI ) healthy middle-aged adult .
DOC.brief_title: Citicoline Effects Cortical Membrane Structure Function
DOC.detailed_description: To determine effect citicoline supplementation cortical structure function healthy middle-aged adult . Test 1 : The effect citicoline ( 500 mg/d ) compare placebo event-related anterior cingulate cortex ( ACC ) activation sustain attention fMRI . Test 2 : The effect citicoline ( 500 mg/d ) compare placebo reaction time increase accuracy sustain attention task ( CPT-IP ) . Test 3 : The effect citicoline compare placebo phosphodiester ( PDE ) b-NTP level ACC 31P-MRS. Test 4 : ACC activation CPT-IP performance ( fMRI ) ACC PDE level ( 31P-MRS ) follow high-dose citicoline ( 500 mg/d ) compare placebo Week 3 . Test 5 : The effect low-dose citicoline ( 250 mg/d ) compare placebo ACC activation CPT-IP performance ( fMRI ) ACC PDE level ( 31P-MRS ) . Test 6 : Among subject ( n=60 ) , relationship baseline red blood cell ( RBC ) omega-3 fatty acid ( EPA+DHA ) level ACC activation , ACC PDE level , effect citicoline .
DOC.criteria: Provision write informed consent ; Ages 4060 year old ; Right hand . If female , pregnant ( determined positive pregnancy test ) ; agree use one follow method birth control : abstinence sexual intercourse , barrier ( diaphragm condom ) , oral/injectable contraceptive ; Contraindication MRI scan ( i.e. , brace , claustrophobia , pacemaker etc ) ; A history major medical ( e.g. , diabetes ) neurological illness ( e.g. , epilepsy ) ; Body mass index ( BMI ) â‰¥ 30 ; An IQ < 75 > 130 ; A positive urine drug test ( nicotine dependence permit ) ; Personal history DSM5 Axis I psychiatric disorder ; Requiring treatment drug might obscure action study treatment .
